description:
Learn how to make 4 different Quiz Games with Swift.

In this course we will teach you how to build 4 quiz games from scratch, we'll start by setting up our project in XCode and then write the code step by step, explaining it along the way.

Quiz games are one of the most popular apps in itunes and are great for everybody that is starting with iOs app development. Apart from a regular multiple choice quiz games that we all know and love, we will teach you how to create three other quiz game variations.

All of the games' source codes are included and available for download.

You can download all of the project files (source codes) and reskin them very easily by adjusting a few settings.

A Multiple Choice Quiz, in which the user can choose between 4 possible answers.

An Image Quiz, in which the user is shown an image and can then select between 4 different answers.

A Right Or Wrong Quiz, in which the user can decide whether a statement is right or wrong.

A Single Choice Quiz, in which the user is asked a question, that he needs to answer by entering the correct answer into a customized textfield.
title: 60+ Minutes of Swift - Making 4 iOs Quiz Games + Source Code
